product: Enhanced brainstorming functionality and researcher features. Improved UI components and workflow optimizations for the Hampazhooh platform.
technical: Updated brainstorm stages (stage3, stage4) with new features, added researcher registration components, and enhanced documentation structure.

product: Initial release of the Zehna therapy platform with comprehensive mental health support features.
technical: Core platform implementation with Nuxt 3, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Includes user authentication, therapy session management, and AI-powered analysis.
rollout: Test core functionality with pilot users
